hi: can anyone help me with installing my wireless windows driver with ndiswrapper?
can anyone help me with ndiswrapper? I think I installed it with ubuntu 8.10, but I don't konw where to find it an how to use it.
search for an INF file then type 'sudo ndiswrapper -i /path/windriver.inf' then 'sudo modprobe ndiswrapper'
